projects.title: Booki
projects.description: Booki is a landing page for a fictional book store. It was created using HTML and CSS. The main goal of this project was to practice my skills in responsive design. The project is hosted on GitHub Pages and you can check it out by clicking the button below

projects.title: Ohmyfood
projects.description: Ohmyfood is a landing page for a fictional food delivery app. It was created using HTML, CSS and Sass. The main goal of this project was to practice my skills in responsive design and animations. The project is hosted on GitHub Pages and you can check it out by clicking the button below

projects.title: Sophie Bluel
projects.alt: representation of the Sophie Bluel project
projects.description: Sophie Bluel is a landing page for a fictional fashion brand. It was created using HTML, CSS and JavaScript. The main goal of this project was to practice my skills in responsive design and JavaScript. The project is hosted on GitHub Pages and you can check it out by clicking the button below
